title: Hand Of Death

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pursue a player at night, attacking them if something else does first.
- Scry during a full moon, revealing a random killing role's identity and role to you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only use one ability each night.
- You will rampage at a player's house when attacking, additionally killing those who visit your target except for the attacker.
- If you try to pursue someone who has not been attacked, your visit fails.
- You will learn the initial attacker's role upon successfully pursuing.

desc:
Post 611
*They were gonna die anyways, you know. It's just happening a bit faster.*
